emailTemplate.name: abuse_notify_author_of_rejected_appeal
emailTemplate.subject: Your appeal display your content on $core_v2_configuration.SiteName
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($post = $core_v2_content.Current) #set($author = $core_v2_user.Get("%{Id=$post.CreatedByUserId}"))

Dear $author.DisplayName,
Thank you for taking the time to respond to the community decision to remove your post. After a careful review, we are unable to restore the content. Please make sure your contributions are appropriate.
